CustomField.description: SFP-9319 [c] Field that contains detail around our strategy in terms of the customer's contribution to balance sheet objectives and how exposure, recoveries and collections are managed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contribution to Balance Sheet objectives? If borrowing, how do you ensure exposure is performing and effectively managed? Exposure at risk, and what corrective measures? Management of write-back/recovery? Collections strategy?
CustomField.label: Balance Sheet Strategy
